review: If you are willing to go on YouTube for 10 mins and look up a basic tutorial to get you started, this game will provide you with hundreds, if not thousands of hours of fun.
Play it, it will take 5 mins of your time, and give you an awesome experience, even if you dont like it, you won't lose anything trying out this game.
